00023 class FormatOptions {
00024     int _width;
00025     int _precision;
00026     std::ios_base::fmtflags _flags;
00027     std::string _delimiter;
00028     std::string _open;
00029     std::string _close;

00031     
00033     explicit FormatOptions(
00034         int width = 8,
00035         int precision = 6,
00036         std::ios_base::fmtflags flags = std::ios_base::fmtflags(0),
00037         std::string const & delimiter = ", ",

00050     template <typename Derived>
00051     void apply(std::ostream & os, ExpressionBase<Derived> const & expr) {
00052         detail::Formatter<Derived>::apply(*this,os,expr,0);
00053     }

00059 template <typename Derived>
00060 std::ostream & operator<<(std::ostream & os, ExpressionBase<Derived> const & expr) {
00061     FormatOptions options;
00062     options.apply(os,expr);
00063     return os;
00064 }

00066 namespace detail {
00067 
00072 template <typename Derived, int N>
00073 struct Formatter {
00074     static void apply(
00075         FormatOptions const & options,
00076         std::ostream & os, 
00077         ExpressionBase<Derived> const & expr,
00078         int level
00079     ) {
00080         os << options._open;
00081         if (!expr.empty()) {
00082             typename ExpressionBase<Derived>::Iterator const end = expr.end();
00083             typename ExpressionBase<Derived>::Iterator iter = expr.begin();
00084             Formatter<typename ExpressionBase<Derived>::Reference>::apply(options,os,*iter,level+1);
00085             for (++iter; iter != end; ++iter) {
00086                 os << options._delimiter;
00087                 os << std::endl << std::string(level,' ');
00088                 Formatter<typename ExpressionBase<Derived>::Reference>::apply(options,os,*iter,level+1);
00089             }
00090         }
00091         os << options._close;
00092     }
00093 };
00094 
00099 template <typename Derived>
00100 struct Formatter<Derived,1> {
00101     static void apply(
00102         FormatOptions const & options,
00103         std::ostream & os, 
00104         ExpressionBase<Derived> const & expr,
00105         int level
00106     ) {
00107         os << options._open;
00108         if (!expr.empty()) {
00109             typename ExpressionBase<Derived>::Iterator const end = expr.end();
00110             typename ExpressionBase<Derived>::Iterator iter = expr.begin();
00111             int precision = os.precision(options._precision);
00112             int width = os.width(options._width);
00113             std::ios_base::fmtflags flags = os.setf(options._flags,std::ios_base::floatfield);
00114             os << (*iter);
00115             for (++iter; iter != end; ++iter) {
00116                 os << options._delimiter << (*iter);
00117             }
00118             os.precision(precision);
00119             os.width(width);
00120             os.setf(flags);
00121         }
00122         os << options._close;
00123     }
00124 };
